attributes.review: so i was ready to download my app for my mister president but it it took TWO WEEKS TO DOWNLOAD i am beyond upset. then when it finally loaded the app was HORRIBLE fonts and the organization looked as if a 12 year old it did smh. my phone had crashed and i started getting werid stuff from the app. u jus lost my vote mr trump😡
attributes.title: WORST APP EVER SCARY!

attributes.review: when I opened the app, it didn’t load. so I tried to refresh it and reset it, but then it told me to not vote third party and vote Biden because trumps administration is destroying our country! I had to delete the app. I came for lies and instead they gave me the truth. deeply hurt and disappointed.
attributes.title: not good

attributes.review: when I opened the app, it didn’t load. so I tried to refresh it and reset it, but then it told me to not vote third party and vote Biden because trumps administration is destroying our country! I had to delete the app. I came for lies and instead they gave me the truth. deeply hurt and disappointed.
attributes.title: not good

attributes.review: Like many other users it took days in order to install. It was a nightmare to use and didn’t have much of a purpose If i could give it no stars, trust me I would. Be careful this takes up so much space. SAVE YOUR GIGS. If you download you might have health issues.
attributes.title: HORRIBLE

attributes.review: this app was hard to use. it is like it was created in the 1800s. and i also think that it needs a new update. in the new update maybe include a new president or a new person who’s qualified. it also made my phone stop working and it kept on glitching. THIS APP IS NOT WORTH IT AND IT MUST BE OUT OF THE APP STORE!!
attributes.title: Trash app

attributes.review: So , I download this app to see what my gOod Trump was up too and once I opened the app my phone started to glitch and my screen kept going black so i deleted the app then downloaded it again and its did the same. It’s best for the app to just get deleted and not waste peoples time. DO NOT GET THIS APP!
attributes.title: so bad

attributes.review: I tried to get this app to make fun of the orange that some people call their president😡 but it took a month to download and once it did gave me no information and was a horrible addition to the array of apps on my phone. Would not reccomend, -11/10😤🤢🤮
attributes.title: Horrible and Awful

attributes.review: Got this app to support our wonderful president but the app kept glitching. It also seemed like it was made by a child because the language choice was extremely poor and not professional at all. Due to this I will be voting for Joe Biden this upcoming presidential election #Biden2020
attributes.title: Glitches too much!

attributes.review: i was extremely excited to see all the new things our future president is planning, but i was greatly disappointed after downloading this app. It was full of false information and lies. I am now switching to the left side, vote blue 2020.
attributes.title: Disappointed

attributes.review: As a Gen Z, I am severely addicted to my phone and needed a new game to play. 👁👄👁 I downloaded this one and it was very boring. It asked for my phone number like it was hitting on me or something. As a blind person, this was very offensive to me because it didn’t have any brail subtitles. Very disappointed.
attributes.title: Terrible game 🧚🏼‍♀️✨
